General.Name: Country Group Holdings Public Company Limited
General.Description: Country Group Holdings Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, primarily engages in the securities business in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Securities and Derivatives Brokerage, Investment Banking, and Securities and Derivatives Trading. It offers securities brokerage, securities trading, underwriting, investment advisory, mutual fund management, private fund management, securities borrowing and lending, and venture capital management services. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
